entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 8.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 4:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog

Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km

Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
